messages.subject: Mystery shopping for New Englanders
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been meaning to pass this on and perhaps it s expired, but perhaps it s not! We ve been doing these mystery shops for Pulseback for 6 months or so. I
messages.messageBody:
I've been meaning to pass this on and perhaps it's expired, but perhaps it's
not!

We've been doing these "mystery shops" for Pulseback for 6 months or so. I
guess corporations hire Pulseback to pay local customers to visit various
stores and then report back how the experience went and whether the stores
are maintaining corporate standards. (There are other stores beside Papa
Ginos, not all restaurants. There's a list at the Pulseback website.)

Anyway, for the restaurant shops, you get paid ($15 or so depending on
whether it's lunch or dinner) to order something and then fill out a form
(takes about 15 mintues) on the appearance of the store, courtesy of the
employees, quality of the food and so forth. Basically it's a free lunch,
depending on how many you feed. You'll have to order 1 of 2 specific items
and then the rest you order is up to you. Or nothing more if you don't want
to.

This one's for a delivery to introduce people to the idea of mystery
shopping so the form is probably a lot simpler than in store shops.

It's an interesting thing to do, free lunch and they only ask every couple
of months or so. There's no requirement to do any of the shops they send
emails out for. It's all voluntary.

Joyce

===================
$$ Looking for Shoppers for Papa Gino's Delivery Secret Shops $$

We are currently looking for people to "secret shop" Papa Gino's delivery
service.

This is a great first time experience for a new shopper. You don't have to
leave your house! Just call for a pizza to be delivered and fill out the
short online form. Pay is $15. If you have friends or neighbors, who you
think would enjoy performing this secret shop, please encourage them to
contact us.

We will pay you $5 if you recruit a new delivery mystery shopper who
successfully completes a Papa Gino's delivery mystery shop for us.

Please have the new shopper email delivery@.... They should put
the town name of the Papa Gino's location that delivers to them in the
subject line. (If they live in a city or town with more than one location,
they should also include the street address of the restaurant that delivers
to them.) In the email they should provide their name, phone number and
email address and your name so that we may send you the bonus check. We will
contact them with shop details. For you to qualify for the bonus, the person
must not have previously completed a delivery shop at the given location.

The following is a list of Papa Gino's restaurants that delivery. Please
call the restaurant to confirm that they deliver to you if you are not
certain.



Thank you.
